languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, среди спасенных с Райкада Минорис беженцев происходит что-то скверное. Уже несколько эвакуированных с планеты пассажиров были обнаружены мертвыми или умирающими. Все они были тем или иным образом ослеплены. Боюсь, есть основания полагать, что вместе с беженцами на борт проникли агенты культа".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among the survivors from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases of evacuated refugees being found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear there is reason to believe that there were agents of the cult among the people who came on board."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, среди спасенных с Райкада Минорис беженцев происходит что-то скверное. Уже несколько эвакуированных с планеты пассажиров были обнаружены мертвыми или умирающими. Все они были тем или иным образом ослеплены. Боюсь, есть основания полагать, что вместе с беженцами на борт проникли агенты культа".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among those rescued from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases where evacuated refugees were found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear that there is reason to assume that some of those who arrived on board were agents of the cult."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among those rescued from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases where evacuated refugees were found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear that there is reason to assume that some of those who arrived on board were agents of the cult."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among the survivors from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases of evacuated refugees being found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear there is reason to believe that there were agents of the cult among the people who came on board."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among the survivors from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases of evacuated refugees being found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear there is reason to believe that there were agents of the cult among the people who came on board."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among the survivors from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases of evacuated refugees being found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear there is reason to believe that there were agents of the cult among the people who came on board."

languages.text: 「陛下、ライカド・ミノリスの生存者の間で、不吉な事態が起きております。避難してきた難民が、死体や瀕死の状態で発見されるというケースがすでに何件も発生しているのです。そして、彼ら全員が、様々な手段で目を潰されていました。もしや、乗船してきた人々の中に、教団の工作員がいるのではないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among the survivors from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases of evacuated refugees being found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear there is reason to believe that there were agents of the cult among the people who came on board."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ライカド・ミノリスの生存者の間で、不吉な事態が起きております。避難してきた難民が、死体や瀕死の状態で発見されるというケースがすでに何件も発生しているのです。そして、彼ら全員が、様々な手段で目を潰されていました。もしや、乗船してきた人々の中に、教団の工作員がいるのではないでしょうか」

languages.text: “大人，小莱卡德的幸存者中发生了可怕的事故。我们收到了好几起报告，说船上的难民遭到杀害或濒临死亡。那些人被各种各样的手段弄瞎了眼睛，恐怕我有理由相信，幸存者之中潜藏着邪教的间谍。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among the survivors from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases of evacuated refugees being found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear there is reason to believe that there were agents of the cult among the people who came on board."

traits.locale_text: “大人，小莱卡德的幸存者中发生了可怕的事故。我们收到了好几起报告，说船上的难民遭到杀害或濒临死亡。那些人被各种各样的手段弄瞎了眼睛，恐怕我有理由相信，幸存者之中潜藏着邪教的间谍。”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, quelque chose de sinistre se joue parmi les survivants de Rykad Minoris. Nous avons déjà trouvé plusieurs réfugiés morts ou à l'agonie. Tous ont été aveuglés par divers moyens. Tout porte à croire que des agents du culte se trouvent parmi les réfugiés que nous avons accueillis. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among the survivors from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases of evacuated refugees being found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear there is reason to believe that there were agents of the cult among the people who came on board."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, quelque chose de sinistre se joue parmi les survivants de Rykad Minoris. Nous avons déjà trouvé plusieurs réfugiés morts ou à l'agonie. Tous ont été aveuglés par divers moyens. Tout porte à croire que des agents du culte se trouvent parmi les réfugiés que nous avons accueillis. »

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, sucede algo siniestro entre los supervivientes de Rykad Minoris. Ya se han producido varios casos en los que los refugiados evacuados han aparecido muertos o moribundos. Todos habían sido cegados por varios medios. Me temo que hay motivos para creer que el culto tiene agentes entre la gente que subió a bordo».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among the survivors from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases of evacuated refugees being found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear there is reason to believe that there were agents of the cult among the people who came on board."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, sucede algo siniestro entre los supervivientes de Rykad Minoris. Ya se han producido varios casos en los que los refugiados evacuados han aparecido muertos o moribundos. Todos habían sido cegados por varios medios. Me temo que hay motivos para creer que el culto tiene agentes entre la gente que subió a bordo».

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, etwas Dunkles regt sich unter den Überlebenden von Rykad Minoris. Es wurden mittlerweile mehrere evakuierte Flüchtlinge tot oder sterbend aufgefunden. Alle waren mit unterschiedlichen Mitteln geblendet worden. Ich fürchte, es gibt Grund zu der Annahme, dass unter den Leuten, die an Bord kamen, Agenten des Kultes waren."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among the survivors from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases of evacuated refugees being found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear there is reason to believe that there were agents of the cult among the people who came on board."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, etwas Dunkles regt sich unter den Überlebenden von Rykad Minoris. Es wurden mittlerweile mehrere evakuierte Flüchtlinge tot oder sterbend aufgefunden. Alle waren mit unterschiedlichen Mitteln geblendet worden. Ich fürchte, es gibt Grund zu der Annahm, dass unter den Leuten, die an Bord kamen, Agenten des Kultes waren."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Rykad Minoris'ten kurtulanlar arasında meşum bir şeyler oluyor. Tahliye edilmiş mültecilerin ölü veya ölmek üzereyken bulundukları durumlar oldu. Her birinin görme yetisi, çeşitli yöntemler kullanılarak ellerinden alınmıştı. Korkarım ki gemiye gelenler arasında tarikat mensupları bulunduğuna inanmak için elimizde yeterince sebep mevcut."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, something sinister is unfolding among the survivors from Rykad Minoris. There have already been several cases of evacuated refugees being found either dead or dying. All of them had been blinded using various means. I fear there is reason to believe that there were agents of the cult among the people who came on board."
